quote: So go back to the books. They will comfort you and cheer you. If you earnestly work with them, neither sorrow nor anxiety nor distress nor suffering need trouble your mind any more, no, not evermore.
quote_letters: SO GO BACK TO THE BOOKS THEY WILL COMFORT YOU AND CHEER YOU IF YOU EARNESTLY WORK WITH THEM NEITHER SORROW NOR ANXIETY NOR DISTRESS NOR SUFFERING NEED TROUBLE YOUR MIND ANY MORE NO NOT EVERMORE
